fields.description: Titanium.UI.TextField width please investigate the failure. Please use https://github.com/ewanharris/titanium-mobile-mocha-suite/tree/TIMOB-24816 to find the related testYou can use https://github.com/ewanharris/mocha-test to quickly debug (most) mocha tests)
fields.summary: iOS: Mocha test Titanium.UI.TextField width test failure

comments.body: Merged https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium-mobile-mocha-suite/pull/159 The width test case for textfield was not quite right. rect should be used when getting actual unit values.
